record.title: ORDERS FOR THURSDAY, JULY 19, 2007
record.narrative:
ORDERS FOR THURSDAY, JULY 19, 2007 -- (Senate - July 17, 2007)

[Page: S9530]

speaking.paragraph: Madam President, I ask unanimous consent that when the Senate completes its business today, it stand adjourned until 10 a.m., Thursday, July 19; that on Thursday, following the prayer and pledge, the Journal of proceedings be approved to date, the morning hour be deemed expired and the time for the two leaders reserved for their use later in the day; and the Senate then resume consideration of H.R. 2669.

record.chair: Without objection, it is so ordered.
